In the second image, the number of objects has been reduced to two. Only the green garden pot labeled number 1 and the terracotta-colored pot labeled number 3 remain. The pet dish (number 2) and the blue hat (number 4) that were present in the first image are no longer there.

The second image is different from the first image in that two items (the light blue pet dish and the blue hat) have been removed, leaving only the two pots.
